comments:
Not much to say, except that this exception was thrown while clicking the "Add"  button in the Automatic management of Dependencies section.  Of course closing and reopening the editor worked around the problem.

ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2006-10-27 09:11:22.367
!MESSAGE Widget is disposed
!STACK 0

Not sure why the table control gets disposed when clicking the button.  To fix (atleast the SWTException), I added a check to make sure the control for the table is not disposed before calling the TableViewer.refresh().  Please let me know if you see any more problems post 3.3M4.  If so, please reopen and we can try to figure out why that widget is getting disposed prematurely.
